title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 19 August 2014 - XWiki
content:
has joined #xwiki 00:13  has joined #xwiki 00:18  has joined #xwiki 00:21  has quit 00:29  has quit 00:35  has quit 00:39  has joined #xwiki 00:43  has quit 00:48  has joined #xwiki 00:53  has quit 00:54  has quit 01:00  has quit 01:49  has quit 04:30  has joined #xwiki 04:31  has quit 07:07  has joined #xwiki 07:20  has joined #xwiki 07:36  has quit 07:39  has joined #xwiki 08:02  has joined #xwiki 08:17  has joined #xwiki 08:38  has joined #xwiki 08:41  has quit 08:42  has joined #xwiki 09:01  has joined #xwiki 09:01  has quit 09:01  has joined #xwiki 09:04  has joined #xwiki 09:38  has joined #xwiki 09:40  has joined #xwiki 09:49  has quit 09:55  has joined #xwiki 10:01  has joined #xwiki 10:02  has quit 10:02  has quit 10:02  has quit 10:02  has quit 10:06  has joined #xwiki 10:06  has joined #xwiki 10:08  is now known as 10:08  has joined #xwiki 10:09  has joined #xwiki 10:10  has quit 10:13  has joined #xwiki 10:16  has joined #xwiki 10:24  has joined #xwiki 10:30  has joined #xwiki 10:36  evalica: good morning. Would it be easy to fix the issue with https://www.evernote.com/shard/s119/sh/65c8db83-8cea-4d7d-bd95-b3e3f656b279/a3be8fa549baaa28d194d66d2b43b3b1 ? :) 10:36  vmassol: I think is already reported … 10:37  yes but it's been like this for a long time and reporting is not enough to make it fixed apparently :) 10:37  if it's simple for you, we should fix it IMO 10:37  well :) depends on the priority … I could take a look in 30 min 10:38  nice 10:38  thanks 10:40  has quit 10:42  has joined #xwiki 10:42  has joined #xwiki 11:22  has joined #xwiki 11:34  evalica: thanks 11:34  vmassol: np 11:42  has quit 11:52  has joined #xwiki 12:04  has quit 12:07  has joined #xwiki 12:54  has joined #xwiki 13:13  has quit 13:37  has quit 13:45  has joined #xwiki 14:14  has joined #xwiki 14:23  has quit 14:26  has joined #xwiki 14:27  has quit 14:40  has quit 14:47  has joined #xwiki 14:52  has quit 15:01  has quit 15:02  has joined #xwiki 15:21  has joined #xwiki 15:28  guys 15:28  we have so many build failures on jenkins 15:28  our build state is a mess 15:29  mflorea: seems that http://ci.xwiki.org/view/Functional%20Tests/job/xwiki-enterprise-test-wysiwyg/ has been failing since the 7th of Augsut 15:29  for ex: expected:<
x
> but was:<
x
> 15:29  any idea? 15:30  gdelhumeau: could you make sure you haven't caused any build failure by switching to the flamingo skin? 15:30  this is really important that the build passes 15:30  Yep I have to fix them 15:31  nobody is allowed to break the build, it's the most sacrosaint thing 15:31  then you should recert your changes 15:31  vmassol, looks like has been replaced by span with style 15:31  and fix them first 15:31  because the build is NOT allowed to break 15:31  never 15:32  and right now the build is a joke :( 15:32  and jenkins is even slower than yesterday, going to kill 2 stuck jobs 15:33  (if I can) 15:38  evalica: :) 15:38  I like that quote 15:38  :) I love it … it's very well written - hope you don't mind 15:38  no I don't, it's nice actually and corresponds to my values 15:43  gdelhumeau: do you know the tests you broke? 15:43  grr ci.xwiki.org is really not working well ATM 15:44  Not by heart, I wanted to use ci.xwiki.org 15:44  looks like it's the dashboard going to change the default view if I can 15:45  gdelhumeau: that's not a good way 15:58  has quit 15:59  has left #xwiki 16:00  has joined #xwiki 16:02  mflorea: "vmassol, looks like has been replaced by span with style" I know but the question is who ddi this? :) And then who can fix it? 16:05  vmassol: I don't know who did this, I'm pretty sure it wasn't me :) . If this is the new expected behavior then the test should be update, ideally by the person that introduced the change, otherwise, we need to see what is causing the change. Unfortunately I don't have much time to help.. :( 16:15  working on FM mflorea? 16:15  yes 16:15  ok 16:16  vmassol: http://jira.xwiki.org/issues/?jql=project%20%3D%20FILEMAN%20AND%20resolution%20%3D%20Unresolved%20ORDER%20BY%20priority%20DESC 16:24  mflorea: could you let us now what you did to clean up jenkins to make it fast, I'd like to do it 16:25  rm -fr .hudson/fingerprints/ 16:26  and I also removed some of the job history 16:27  from .hudson/jobs/ 16:31  ok trying that 16:32  mflorea: should I stop jenkins first? 16:32  regarding the history, hmm, I need to keep them for gdelhumeau.... 16:33  the history is not big so it shouldn't be the problem 16:33  going to restart jenkins now 16:33  re fingerprints, yes, stop, but note that the folder is huge, it took a while for me to delete it 16:35  is now known as 16:35  has joined #xwiki 16:48  has quit 16:51  has quit 16:51  upgrading jenkins to latest 16:51  has joined #xwiki 16:54  gdelhumeau: ci is back to normal 16:55  you should be able to access builds results quickly FTM 16:57  has quit 16:57  jobs don't build anymore though 16:57  :) 16:57  http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-commons/1441/console 16:58  seems the fingerprint removal might have broken stuff 16:58  mflorea: any idea? 16:59  try to create an empty fingerprints folder (although Jenkins should have created it) 17:00  there's one 17:00  I only deleted inside it 17:00  ok, then it shouldn't fail 17:01  I cannot login 17:01  vmassol: thanks ! 17:02  I had a NPE trying to log in the first time 17:02  it worked the second time 17:02  doesn't work for me 17:02  I tried several times 17:07  has quit 17:08  retsarting again jenkins 17:08  trying the windows way of solving issues...; 17:09  has quit 17:13  seems version 1.576 of jenkins is completely broken… :( 17:13  ah wait 17:13  I didn't upgrade the plugins 17:13  hmm no 17:14  downgrading 17:27  did someone change the HTML export recently? 17:33  has quit 17:34  vmassol: webjars URLs are not good with the HTML export 17:34  and the webjars resources are not exported in the zip 17:39  has quit 17:46  has joined #xwiki 17:46  has quit 17:47  sorry, was otp 17:47  ok jenkins is building again 17:47  (now that I have downgraded it) 17:52  has joined #xwiki 18:13  has quit 18:14  has quit 18:15  has joined #xwiki 18:15  is now known as 18:18  has joined #xwiki 18:20  has joined #xwiki 18:33  disabling the dashboard view to see how it goes on jenkins 18:52  done 18:52  no more dashboard FTM 18:53  ok 18:53  seems a good idea 18:54  platform is failiing: http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/5925/console 18:54  has quit 18:54  strange error that seems related to rendering 18:54  18:32:40.909 [Thread-10] ERROR o.x.t.i.XWikiLogOutputStream - Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException: null 18:54  18:32:40.909 [Thread-10] ERROR o.x.t.i.XWikiLogOutputStream - at org.xwiki.rendering.wikimodel.xhtml.impl.XhtmlHandler$TagStack.popStackParameter(XhtmlHandler.java:452) ~[xwiki-rendering-wikimodel-6.2-SNAPSHOT.jar:na] 18:55  http://ci.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-platform/5924/consoleFull - I see BUILD SUCCESS 18:55  but Build step 'Groovy Postbuild' marked build as failure 18:57  oui c normal 18:57  oops 18:57  it's the tests that failed 19:07  has quit 19:22  has quit 19:41  has quit 20:01  has quit 20:10  has quit 20:12  has joined #xwiki 20:24  has joined #xwiki 21:08  has joined #xwiki 21:13  has quit 21:31  has joined #xwiki 21:37  has quit 21:58  has joined #xwiki 21:58  has quit 21:58  is now known as 22:16  has joined #xwiki 22:23  has quit 22:28  has joined #xwiki 22:30  has quit 22:30  is now known as 22:35  has quit 22:44  has joined #xwiki 23:13  has joined #xwiki 23:13  has quit 23:17  has quit 23:19  has quit
